comment.author: 27217020@N00
comment._content: Looks like there's a date of 2/22/13 written on the back of this photo, which would mean it was taken a few days before Woodrow Wilson's inauguration on March 3, 1913.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Slack13: Thank you for noticing the date.  We will update the information and reload the description.
